New edit for testing of the upload


function soch() {
    sec_to_monday=`echo "($(date -v +Monday -v 00H -v 00M -v 00S +'%s') - $(date +'%s'))"`
    days_to_monday=`echo "${sec_to_monday} / (3600*24)" | bc`
    hours_to_monday=`echo "(${sec_to_monday} - (${days_to_monday} * (3600*24))) / 3600" | bc`
    minutes_to_monday=`echo "( ( ${sec_to_monday} - (${days_to_monday} * (3600*24)) - (${hours_to_monday} * 3600) ) / 60)" | bc`
    seconds_to_monday=`echo "( ${sec_to_monday} - (${days_to_monday} * (3600*24)) - (${hours_to_monday} * 3600) - (${minutes_to_monday} *60) )" | bc`
    echo "Monday will start in ${days_to_monday} days, ${hours_to_monday} hours, ${minutes_to_monday} minutes, ${seconds_to_monday} seconds"
}


asdsadasd


test publish
